name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Senior Cloud Engineer, I possess extensive expertise in **cloud** technologies, particularly **IaaS**, **PaaS**, and **AIaaS**, with 9 years of experience in crafting scalable software solutions. I have successfully led cross-functional teams in projects using **VMware** and **OpenStack**, while also ensuring high performance and innovation. My skills in **GPU** management, **networking**, and **bare metal** setups further enhance my capability in delivering meaningful technical consulting. Additionally, my strong communication skills enable me to effectively engage in public speaking and presentations, while I maintain a focus on mentoring junior engineers and enhancing user accessibility in all technical endeavors.
